Posts.EditableText: I downloaded a picture for my game, but it didn't accept it in any form. How do I insert a picture.
Posts.HTML: I downloaded a picture for my game, but it didn't accept it in any form. How do I insert a picture.

Posts.EditableText: Should be two blue buttons on up upper center of your page, one for updating game, one for updating picture. The latter one should let you select the photo and have it display. I've found that every time I update the game, I have to redo the picture.
Posts.HTML: Should be two blue buttons on up upper center of your page, one for updating game, one for updating picture. The latter one should let you select the photo and have it display. I've found that every time I update the game, I have to redo the picture.
